title: Remove or vault Tailscale auth key
description: ansible/playbooks/tailscale-exit-nodes.yml:8 contains placeholder 'tskey-auth-XXX-YYYYY'. If real key exists, it should be in ansible-vault or loaded from environment variable to prevent exposure.

title: Document inventory group hierarchy and purpose
description: Multiple overlapping inventory groups (manage_ssh_access, manage_root_ssh_access, console_autologin, debian_cts, debian_vms, etc.) could lead to confusion. Create documentation explaining the hierarchy, purpose, and relationship between groups.

title: Migrate with_items to loop in tailscale-hosts.yml
description: ansible/playbooks/pve/tasks/tailscale-hosts.yml:6 uses deprecated 'with_items' instead of modern 'loop' directive. Migrate for consistency with modern Ansible best practices.

title: Add validation that every nixos module in modules/ has proper key
description: According to CLAUDE.md, having 'key' in every module is of utmost importance, as it's used for deduplication by the module system. This task is to add validation to ensure all NixOS modules in modules/ directory have a proper key attribute defined.

title: Document privilege escalation strategy
description: Only clevis-luks.yml has explicit 'become: true' at play level. Other playbooks rely on 'ansible_user: root' in inventory. Document the privilege escalation strategy - when to use become vs ansible_user, and be consistent.

title: Remove hardcoded deployableSystems list in deploy.nix
Clean up or document unused inventory groups
description: Inventory groups like 'debian_vms' are referenced but have no hosts defined. 'console_autologin' may also be unused. Review all groups in ansible/inventories/home/hosts.yml and either populate them, remove them, or document their intended future use.

title: Make every module fully self-contained with explicit dependency imports
description: Currently modules don't explicitly import their dependencies (sops, arion, expose-local-http, etc). Each module should be self-contained and explicitly import all its dependencies. Need to also develop a testing strategy to verify this (e.g., try loading each module in isolation).

title: Replace hardcoded IPs with inventory system lookups
Create agent skill to document NixOS module patterns
description: Create a new agent skill that documents common patterns appearing in nixos modules. Initial patterns to document: 1) Complex one-shot systemd services with dependencies and scripts, 2) attrsOf submodule pattern for configuring multiple instances. The skill should provide examples from this codebase and explain when to use each pattern.

title: Standardize specialArgs.inventoryHostName across all machine configs
Verify sshd role restart handler exists
description: ansible/roles/sshd/tasks/main.yml uses 'notify: restart sshd' but need to verify the handler is properly defined in ansible/roles/sshd/handlers/main.yml. Check if handler exists and is correctly configured.

title: Fix git config commands in etckeeper.yml
description: Git commands in ansible/playbooks/pve/tasks/etckeeper.yml use invalid syntax 'git config get' and 'git config set'. Should be 'git config --get' and 'git config' (without set). Lines 6, 13, 15, 22. Also fix task name on line 20 which says 'Set git user.name' but should say 'Set git user.email'.

title: Reference VictoriaMetrics endpoint from inventory
description: ansible/playbooks/pve/vars/main.yml:4 hardcodes VictoriaMetrics endpoint to '192.168.2.2:8428'. Should reference from inventory or ip-allocation.yaml for maintainability and consistency with single source of truth.

title: Make tailscale.nix manage 'tailscale serve' configuration
Add project-wide ansible-lint configuration
description: No .ansible-lint configuration file exists in ansible/ root directory (though external roles have them). Add project-wide ansible-lint configuration to enforce consistency and catch issues early.

title: Fix typo in impermanence.nix: evironment â†’ environment
Remove committed external collections and roles
description: ansible/ext-collections/ and ansible/ext-roles/ directories contain committed external dependencies which bloats repo and makes updates harder. Move to .gitignore and use 'ansible-galaxy install -r requirements.yml' instead. Update .gitignore and document in README.
close_reason: Already completed - ext-collections/ and ext-roles/ are already in .gitignore

title: Add firewalld zone verification in tailscale-exit-nodes.yml
description: ansible/playbooks/tailscale-exit-nodes.yml:19-26 has complex loop assigning interfaces to firewalld zones but doesn't verify zones exist first. Add tasks to ensure zones are created before assignment to prevent errors.

title: Standardize FQCN usage across all playbooks
description: Mix of FQCN (ansible.builtin.*) and short-form module names (package, copy, file, lineinfile, systemd) throughout playbooks/pve/tasks/. Standardize on FQCN for clarity and future compatibility.

title: Remove empty provision.yml or document purpose
description: ansible/provision.yml exists but is completely empty (only newline). Either remove it or add a comment explaining its intended purpose.

title: Fix module parameters in backup-raum-to-bael.yml
description: ansible/playbooks/pve/tasks/backup-raum-to-bael.yml:20-23 uses 'systemd' module (should use FQCN ansible.builtin.systemd_service) and parameters like 'enabled: yes' should use boolean 'true' instead of string 'yes'.
